tool_description: This parser will help you collect the most complete information about products and categories, as well as countries and other information.
name: ASOS Api
title: ASOS Api

api_list.name: countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://asos-api1.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: categories
api_list.description: Get categories and menus from ASOS
api_list.code:

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://asos-api1.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: products

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: The number of items per page

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: The offset to skip already viewed products

required_parameters.name: categoryId
required_parameters.description: The value of categoryId field from categories API

required_parameters.name: store
required_parameters.description: Get value from store field from countries API

optional_parameters.name: sizeSchema
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable value from countries API

api_list.name: product

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable value from countries API

optional_parameters.name: store
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable store value from countries API, this param is not sideId as in products API

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable value from countries API

optional_parameters.name: sizeSchema
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable value from countries API
